name: ShellScript
description: Run a shell script using Bash
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: scriptPath
inputs.label: Script Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root of the shell script file to run.

inputs.name: args
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments passed to the shell script

inputs.name: disableAutoCwd
inputs.label: Specify Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The default behavior is to set the working directory to the script location. This enables you to optionally specify a different working directory.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory where the script is run.  Empty is the root of the repo (build) or artifacts (release), which is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory).

inputs.name: failOnStandardError
inputs.label: Fail on Standard Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.
